An optional list of Strings specifying feature columns to be
used to predict the target, if not provided, default to use all the
other columns in the trainingData, except the one specified by targetColumn

is provided it will save training progress. If there is progress already saved training

abstract.text: Create machine learning models for use in your app.
A classifier that predicts the target by creating rules to split the data.
Parameters that affect the process of training a model.
The names of the columns you selected at initialization to train the classifier.
Creates a decision tree classifier classifier  from a checkpoint.
Creates a decision tree classifier.
Creates a Decision Tree Classifier from the feature columns in the training data to predict the categories in
the target column.
Creates or restores a training session.
Creates or restores a training session.
The underlying parameters used when training the model.
Restores an existing training session.
Resumes a training session from the last checkpoint if available.
The name of the column you selected at initialization to define which categories the classifier predicts.
Trains a decision tree classifier.
Trains a decision tree classifier.
The representation of a model’s asynchronous training session you use to
monitor the session’s progress or terminate its execution.
The configuration settings for a training session.
A collection that arranges data in rows and columns.
A Unicode string value that is a collection of characters.
